Producer: Neil Jordan, Redmond Morris, Stephen Woolley
Production Co: Four Provinces Films, FilmFour Productions, Close Call Films, Bord Scannan Na hEireann, Company of Wolves [gb], DreamWorks SKG, Senator Film Produktion GmbH, Scala Productions
Synopsis: A second-rate actor (Michael Caine) and a colleague (Dylan Moran) try to swindle money from a group of inept criminals.
Title: The Actors
